website_summaries.verdict: With comparable performance to other brands, this set stands out for including three skillets at a price point not much higher than other brands' single skillets.
pros: Consumers praise the great value for the price, heavy duty design, and good quality of this set
cons: Occasionally there were reports of rust, and some had issues with sticking food

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: All three showed up cracked or broken. They are hard to get pics of but I attached pics there are hairline cracks if you look closely and any use would knock the other handles off as well.
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: great cast iron pans for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend, whom needed an upgrade from his rotted scratched up old teflon pans. I use a lot of cast iron myself, and these are just as good as the rest of them. Would be awesome set for camping. They come preoiled, but know better to remove and season. I helped him learn how to do that, plus how to clean (No soap) them. Save your kitchen rags for cleaning, and get some Silicone handles.This set should last a lifetime if taken cared of.
customer_reviews.author: kPwn

customer_reviews.title: Great skillets, non-stick, well-made for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cast iron set! Seasoning went well. I used olive oil. After seasoning they still look/feel roughly textured but I've used the two biggest ones already and they are easily non-stick despite the rough texture. Even made fried eggs without bursting the yolk, they were so non-stick! I would highly recommend this set to anyone looking for a good-quality product that's very affordable. I would definitely purchase these again or even as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Polach

customer_reviews.title: Handles are not pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful skillets BUT the handles are insignificant/small. Not pleasing to “handle” - glad I purchased the silicone handle holder or these would not be usable. Handles should be more substantial/longer. **after perusing more skillet options, it became apparent that this is a cast iron skillet design flaw. WHY such small handles?? Why? Why? Why?**
customer_reviews.author: Niryana

customer_reviews.title: Good cookware.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. As a matter of personal taste, I washed and seasoned these pans right out of the box. I use Coconut oil for seasoning cast iron. The first time I used the large skillet I made fried eggs, and they cooked evenly and without sticking. What more can you ask of a frying pan?
customer_reviews.author: D Becker

customer_reviews.title: Bought for camping; after a good seasoning these will be just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set specifically for camping, as I already have well-seasoned cast iron that has been passed down in my family, as well as a skillet I purchased myself a few years ago. This set comes with three different sizes, the smallest of which would be perfect for baking a large chocolate chip skillet cookie, or for single servings of fried eggs. The downside is that these pre-seasoned skillets are rough, and need re-seasoning. Once you go through that process, they are worth the price. So put a little elbow grease into it, and you won't be disappointed. Do not trust the factory seasoning to be non-stick!
customer_reviews.author: KMarDil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off by saying that cast ironware requires some knowledge base to use (eg how keep it oiled, how to cook at appropriate temperatures, and how to maintain/clean it for longevity). It isn’t as straightforward as stainless or ceramic, but it is a high quality and long-term buy. This set meets those qualities, and isn’t intimidating or difficult to get started with as a beginner. The size variety is great so you can use it with different ingredients/recipes. I’ve used it several times since getting it a few days ago and so far each time has been great, and the maintenance has been super easy. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Must season it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend seasoning it before use regardless of what it says. Other than that, they have been holding up fine. I've used the large one to fry and didn't need to season it. Cook eggs without sticking at all if properly seasoned but not straight out of the box. (everything ended up burning/sticking)
customer_reviews.author: Customer McCustomerface

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying my cast iron skillets. As advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my cast iron skillets. As advertised they heat evenly, it is not necessary to cook on high heat. Most comforting is knowing carcinogens are not leaching into my foods.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fine Cookware
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with my purchase, The quality of the cast iron skillets is very durable and long lasting I'm entertaining a lot of guest this Christmas so having good quality and presentable cookware is an added bonus to me I have to say I am pleasantly surprised with this cast iron skillet set, The finish is very glossy and the food cooks very well also it's easy to clean i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey's

customer_reviews.title: Likey
customer_reviews.text: I use the bigger of the trio everyday. Beware though, it may be worth reading up on or youtubing these types of skillets if you have never used. I ruined the other 2 before I caught on and had to bring the bigger back from the brink of death. They dont require the same approach when cleaning...you will get a rust bucket if your not cautious. These here are adultier adult pans.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the 3 was broken on arrival so had to return them. Since these were supposed to be an Amazon best buy, "heavy duty" "professional" etc, we are hesitant to buy any similar ones again. The ones I have have lasted over 50 years, and I love them. These are junk.
customer_reviews.author: KaliKali

customer_reviews.title: Everything stick to the EXTREMELY ROUGH cooking surface.
customer_reviews.text: Everything sticks to the extremely rough cooking surface. I have used cast iron skillets in the past to fry eggs, meat, etc but this skillet's cooking surface that I could not use it to fry eggs and the meat I was trying to fry/heat up stuck like glue. In desperation I decided to try to smooth the surface with a angle grinder. I was able to smooth the cooking surface of the 10" skillet but so much grime was created I am loath to try it now.
customer_reviews.author: jake d.

customer_reviews.title: very simple and quality skillets.
customer_reviews.text: to cook in a cast iron skillets is very diferent as to cook in aluminum or steel. the heat is even in the surface, the heat last a large time after cut off the flames ... im very happy to use tem. I bought a larger skillet ( 14") to make a full set. The tiny skillet is useful to make sauces to moist beef or poultry
customer_reviews.author: jenny mayan

customer_reviews.title: Rust after first use
customer_reviews.text: After one day of use I get a bunch of rust spot buildups. After my first use I used hot water and sponge to wash. Came back to it the next morning and see this as shown in my photo. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality set of cast iron skillets for a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly impressed with the quality of these cast iron skillets especially for the price!! They are super durable and very easy to maintain. It's almost effortless to clean them. I love the variety of sizes included in this set. Being able to utilize 3 different sizes, both in and out of the oven definitely makes a great difference in my everyday cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kodii Koss

customer_reviews.title: Defiantly not preseasoned
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly not preseasoned. First egg burnt right to the pan. Will probably need to be seasoned 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: Rollincoal02

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t matter how many times I season these things, ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t matter how many times I season these things, EVERYTHING sticks to them. End up with half of my dish stuck to the bottom of the pan. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Byron B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy duty pans!
customer_reviews.text: We gave these a try after hearing a lot of good things about cast iron skillets! REMEMBER to season the pans before use!! The skillets are great to use! We made some chicken tenders and it was able to keep the flavor, cook the meat all the way through, and not dry them out! We are excited to continue trying different recipes!
customer_reviews.author: P. K.

customer_reviews.title: They may cook just fine once they have seasoned more
customer_reviews.text: The pans were a lot lighter than the other ones I have. The cooking surface was rougher and appeared less finished. They may cook just fine once they have seasoned more. I'm just starting to use them and have to admit the lightness and courser finish was a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Glade

customer_reviews.title: it should smooth out nicely. I could always grind the preseaoning off
customer_reviews.text: The pre-seasoning was a bit rough, but with additional uses and re-seasoning, it should smooth out nicely. I could always grind the preseaoning off, and start over with a smoother cooking service, if needed. They are really well made and I cooked some over easy eggs on the 8 inch skillet today, and with just a touch of butter, no sticking at all. They are a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Braski

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very thrilled with this purchase. I added additional seasoning before using. I've never used cast iron before and made a steak dinner tonight and it turned out better than on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Bill May

customer_reviews.title: THESE SKILLETS STICK REALLY BAD.
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t buy these skillets. Everything that I have tried in them sticks really bad. I even seasoned them myself and it didn’t help a bit.If the box didn’t get tossed out by mistake, they would be back at Amazon by now..
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Love cooking on it
customer_reviews.text: Love cooking on it! I researched on youtube on how to take care of it and so far so good. It still looks as new as the day i bought it. Bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: katz b

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It cooks my food evenly
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It cooks my food evenly, its safer than non stick pans, and overall love it was sold as a three piece set!
customer_reviews.author: camaz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I hate I threw the box out that these came in because I would be returning them. The slightest bit of moisture left on them and they rust. Very disappointed. They’re just sitting in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Maja

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizes!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with cast iron--impossible to destroy. Not sure how much I'll use the smallest one but the medium is perfect for 1-2 eggs and the large skillet is great for just about everything else. Cast iron works better than non-stick in my opinion, plus it's not toxic
customer_reviews.author: Thin Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: not sure this is cast iron,,washing by hand they still took on a rusty look that came off ob the paper towel!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: glenda miller

customer_reviews.title: These cast iron skillets are perfect for searing steaks and putting the skillet directly into ...
customer_reviews.text: These cast iron skillets are perfect for searing steaks and putting the skillet directly into the oven. Easy to clean, multiple sizes and the best part is they will last forever! Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ajduren

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get better than that
customer_reviews.text: Sent as an early Chanukah gift to my granddaughter, when she received the box called me to tell me she used them immediately. Doesn't get better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Set
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived undamaged, but when I opened it up the handles of all but the smallest had broken off. It was so disappointing to open the box to the broken pans. I returned them immediately and will find a better brand that will hopefully last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K

customer_reviews.title: Love these skillets!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, cast iron takes a little more work to maintain but it is better than chemicals from non-stick skillets. Once seasoned, it is very nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: Ok Product
customer_reviews.text: These are ok so far. This was my first experience with cast irons. I noticed a little rust after one use. Not sure if that's normal. Otherwise, they cook well.
customer_reviews.author: Tenesha West

customer_reviews.title: These preseasoned skillets are right on time and will be put to good use! I love that I have a variety ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about these cast iron skillets. I have been wanting some for quite some time but was dreading having to season them so they would be ready for use. These preseasoned skillets are right on time and will be put to good use! I love that I have a variety of sizes to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: These were better quality than I expected. They are super sturdy and heavy. Just make sure to treat them before you use them
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Turk

customer_reviews.title: These skillets are great for cooking, baking and outdoors grilling.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these skillets are multi purpose, multi functional. You can use them almost anywhere and they're easy to clean. They are rugged and built for durability.
customer_reviews.author: J01ames

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made set
customer_reviews.text: Well made and sturdy. I gave these as a wedding gift along with Disney's "Tangled" movie. It was a great hit!
customer_reviews.author: Helen in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for friends of mine for their wedding. It was on the registries so I got the one that they requested and they absolutely loved them. They like to take them camping.
customer_reviews.author: Meg’s_Finds

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for low price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have never owned cast iron before so we've made a few mistakes in maintaining these, but after some research, we're doing much better. We love cooking in these, but hate washing them. They always smell like egg afterwards for some reason, but they do work great and are pretty heavy. This set was affordable and is of great quality, in our opinion.
customer_reviews.author: ramos_1099

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking pizza
customer_reviews.text: These skillets are perfect for baking. The sizes were just what I needed to make some pizzas. Overall the quality of these are great and they are very heavy. For $30 it was beyond my expectations and works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Stiven

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: The three skillets are a great addition to any kitchen. I love the texture of this particular cast iron product. They are heavy duty and would be able to withstand the test of time. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brye

customer_reviews.title: A Wedding Gift
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what this product is like. I gave it as a wedding gift. But the bride says it seems OK to her.
customer_reviews.author: BillyA

customer_reviews.title: These were a Wedding gift; don’t know how they are.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Wedding Gift & sent to Washington state. Have NO IDEA HOW THESE SHOULD BE JUDGED!!️
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. McPike

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend re-seasoning these skillets as soon as you get them ...
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable set of Cast Iron skillets! However, I would recommend re-seasoning these skillets as soon as you get them because the factory seasoning leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase i made
customer_reviews.text: I'm super happy with my purchase, The quality of the cast iron skillets is very durable and long lasting I'm entertaining a lot of guest this Christmas so having good quality and presentable cookware is an added bonus to me I have to say I am pleasantly surprised with this cast iron skillet set, The finish is very glossy and the food cooks very well also it's easy to clean i highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: john bonilla

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.  We are enjoying using all of these skillets!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that we didn't like about this skillet set is that the box it came in was open and the packaging was slightly damaged. Otherwise the skillets were in fine shape. The skillets come in the various sizes and are very well made and are great for cooking. We really enjoy this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pans I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I spent 6 hours seasoning these and they are amazing. They are a joy to cook with.
customer_reviews.author: Dpcurtis

customer_reviews.title: Great cast iron skillets
customer_reviews.text: This cast iron skillets are so nice and sturdy. I already seasoned mine and they work as well as the expensive version. So happy with my purchase. I might be getting a few as presents.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J Cordero

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I had used cast iron pans for years but for a couple years now was without I think my son took them so yes I love these pans. They cook great and you can cook so much with them. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: doreen

customer_reviews.title: but this set is great. Just keep it seasoned when you storing it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a pro cook, that's why probably i can't tell the difference between these and way more expensive onse, but this set is great. Just keep it seasoned when you storing it and I am sure it will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for home kitchen use.
customer_reviews.text: Really like them. I did season them before I used them because that makes sense. Really sturdy with nice handles. I'll probably get a silicone grip because I'm forgetful and they do get hot! The 6" is great for making sauces and the 8" is great for smaller plates or omelets. The 10" is pretty much great for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: These are very poor quality. After one use
customer_reviews.text: These are very poor quality. After one use, rust started to appear. I tried to coat the pan again and remove the rust. I was able to remove the rust but anytime I cook, I can taste the rust. I have another plan from amazon that was $20 for a 12 inch. That one is amazing. Never rusts. Barely need to coat. Can use it on the stove or in the oven. 0 problems. I cannot say the same about this.
customer_reviews.author: Mirela

customer_reviews.title: No kitchen complete without a set!
customer_reviews.text: I had one cast iron pot that LastPass down to my mother from her mother. It is my favorite pot I do almost everything in it. I complained for years about how they didn't make pots like those anymore, well I was wrong! These are them! Love love love them
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion!

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL SKILLETS!
customer_reviews.text: ALL OF THEM ARE VERY SMALL.. THE BIGGEST ONE DOESNT EVEN LOOK LIKE A SIZE 10. MORE LIKE AN 8. THANK GOODNESS I HAVE A TINY FAMILY BECAUSE IF I DIDNT THIS SET WOULDNT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: MONIQUE

customer_reviews.title: Must have product
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I needed. They are great on my pellet grill, my induction burner, as well as stove top. Absolutely perfect. !!
customer_reviews.author: E. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The exterior and inside the pan look very well made ...
customer_reviews.text: The exterior and inside the pan look very well made. I made a cake in one, both on top of the stove and in the oven. Turned out well.
customer_reviews.author: Gingkogirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These three skillets are the perfect sizes. Love their durability and know they will be used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Acarsess

customer_reviews.title: Bridal shower gift
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a bridal shower gift which the bride had requested on her Amazon bridal registry. My husband, who is a die hard Lodge fan, was dubious about the brand. Even he is satisfied with the set...its weight is comparable to cast iron we currently own...we are pleased and hope the bridal couple will enjoy it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the old original cast iron pans
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made,food sticks on them even when I use oil in the pan. Very poorly made. I like the old original cast iron pans.
customer_reviews.author: Magda T.

customer_reviews.title: A must to own
customer_reviews.text: Love these gotta have them if you a cook .
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Great pans and great price
customer_reviews.text: Got these for camping and cooking at my house. They were sold for a great price and are quality pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping addresses.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wedding gift bought on the couple’s registry list and was supposed to be shipped to the couple’s address. It was shipped to me, 800 miles away from the couple. I’m driving so no harm, no foul since carrying it on a plane would be out of the question.
customer_reviews.author: William Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Worked great and the chicken I cooked tasted great. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: High quality skillets
customer_reviews.text: The three high quality cast iron skillets are perfect sizes for a variety of uses from two fried eggs to multitude pieces of fish. These skillets are a great addition to anyone's cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy C

customer_reviews.title: Options for Size
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cast iron skillet with multiple sizes. Nothing beats a nice hot meal cooked in a cast iron skillet. Love making eggs with cast iron but to drag out the large heavy skillet is always a drag. These are the best alternative and will be my go to going forward!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooking Pans
customer_reviews.text: Great cooking pans! I like the heavy pans and great for making pasta. I do recommend getting some Silicone handles and it will last for a long time because it will never break due to the quality of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and very durable!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part about these iron skillets is the fact that they are so easy to clean after cooking. These iron skillets are also very affordable for the quality you get. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Welcome home
customer_reviews.text: I have used cast iron since I learned to cook. I was 12, I am now 65. About a year ago my old cast iron skillet became pitted, because of misuse by a family member. Anyway I had to toss it. I didn't realize how much I missed it. I absolutely love my new skillets.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley grateful

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is high quality and looks long lasting and made out of non-stick material.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Well-made set for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. All three of the skillets are solidly constructed and the sizes included allow for versatility in the kitchen. I didn't find that I needed to preseason these - they worked for me right out of the box. This is a must for any home chef - and the price is unbeatable here.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Russo

customer_reviews.title: Plum tickled!
customer_reviews.text: We are plum tickled with the pans. They are a little rough like the new ones are. But the seasoning and quality are real, real nice. We appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 😍🥰great quality as is
customer_reviews.text: They feel very light 😍they will still get the job done can't wait to start cooking
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised! This is an excellent cast iron set. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Johanson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pans!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cast iron pans due to there size and reputation . I was surprised after using them to cook an omelette and it did not stick and cooked evenly like my old pan. Can’t wait to cook some steaks and see how those come out. I am content with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jellz

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: The surface is very rough and foods stick more than I would have thought, so I don't use it as much as I would like. I'll keep working with them and hopefully at some point they'll be more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price for the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a great combo, that my mother use to have.
customer_reviews.author: Laticia

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great. They look good and are perfect for dishes that require cast iron char
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Great taste love the size varieties
customer_reviews.text: The perfect set for a cook as myself. I plan to have this set for years. I could even bake a variety of sizes in these and the taste is amazing as well! Will gift for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great set to replace regular pans
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for myself to replace teflon pans I have been using for years. All 3 sizes are very convenient. Read up on how to take care of these if you do not know already. I always keep oiled and never leave water in it after washing. Great price for 3 skillets. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and good quality skillets
customer_reviews.text: New to cast iron so I jumped on this deal. Very heavy and good quality skillets! Excited to get started using them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Good deals
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 diff sets 1 for my daughter and 2 for both my grand-daughters all three love them and use all the time. The price was good and the product is also good.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA BARRERE

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! Gifted to my father for Christmas, he uses them regularly and loves them
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Small but functional
customer_reviews.text: If you need small cast iron pans for camping, etc. then these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Kearney

customer_reviews.title: This is a high-quality little set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set of cast-iron skillet's. Very high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Loovvee!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had cast iron before so I have nothing to compare these too. I love the price and the variety of sizes. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Knucklehead211

customer_reviews.title: Great pans.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves them. They have a good feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: Dale G

customer_reviews.title: After one wash the larger one rusted horribly and I cant use it again
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than advertised. After one wash the larger one rusted horribly and I cant use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pan skillet
customer_reviews.text: This skillet is amazing. Steak tastes like I was having a Peter luger moment. You can cook any type of meat and make it taste like first class
customer_reviews.author: ji

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding gift of their choice. They lived them!
customer_reviews.author: Mindful

customer_reviews.title: Product Review
customer_reviews.text: Love cooking with this pan. This is now my go to pan for seared steaks, chicken fajitas, Chinese beef and broccoli and so much more. Also it's not heavy for me to pick feels super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Scott

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t know why I buy this the quality is really bad
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Nice and small iron skillet set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this iron skillet set, its super easy to clean, and its nice and small so its super easy to put away without taking up too much space. I would definitely buy another for one of my spouses.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo O

customer_reviews.title: Super Skillets
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Very pleased with the quality of these pans and the price was great. Looking forward to having these for a lifetime. Three sizes - a perfect addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: BeBe

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Was in need of some skillets after my last ones broke and I did some research into these. After purchasing them I can say I have no regrets at all. Great purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: obiajulu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These cast iron skillets are great! Very doable, came pre-seasoned and ready to use immediately. Great value for all 3. Will definitely use for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: AmyNickle

customer_reviews.title: More expensive when included on a bridal registry
customer_reviews.text: More than $20 cheaper after being purchased through a bridal registry. Not cool
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Buy some better pans than these
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap pans, rough cooking surface and poorly seasoned. Buy some better pans than these. BAD producdt
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! So happy to finally get a set of these! We have a glass stove top and they are fine on it. We use 1 or 2 of these everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Roses

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like it.
customer_reviews.text: I received my skillets same day. They are heavy just like my old set from 35 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Latia H

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with cast iron. Great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Simple Chef Cast Iron Skillet 3-Piece Set - Best Heavy-Duty Professional Restaurant Chef Quality Pre-Seasoned Pan Cookware Set - 10", 8", 6" Pans - Great For Frying, Saute, Cooking, Pizza & More,Black
product_meta.description:
Cast iron skillets are a timeless must-have for every kitchen! The Simple Chef Cast Iron Skillet 3-Piece Set is better than a Lodge Cast Iron Skillet Set - just ask our customers! With this heavy duty and virtually indestructible, so they will last you years, decades, and generations to come! Our skillets are factory pre-seasoned, so they are ready to use straight out of the box. Our cast iron cookware is multi-functional, and suitable for many different cooking methods. Use them on the stovetop, in the oven, over a campfire, and even when slow-cooking! They’re perfect for frying, sautéing, cooking, grilling, and more. Plus our design has superior heat retention and conducts heat evenly, so your food will turn out great every time! 

Don’t wait. Purchase your own Simple Chef Cast Iron Skillet 3-Piece Set Now, and forgo purchasing just an ordinary Lodge Cast Iron Skillet Set!
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY – Cast iron skillets are a timeless must-have for every kitchen. The Simple Chef Cast Iron Skillet 3-Piece Set is virtually indestructible and will last years, decades. Better than any Lodge cast iron set!

READY TO USE – The skillet set is ready to use, straight out of the box. They are factory pre-seasoned, which is much more effective than at home pre-seasoning. Factory pre-seasoning makes our cast iron skillets virtually non-stick, easy to clean, protected against scratches, and will also make your food rich in flavor!

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL – Our cast iron cookware is multi-functional, and suitable for many different cooking methods. Use our skillets on the stove top, in oven, over a campfire, and even when slow-cooking! Our set is great for frying, sautéing, cooking, grilling, and more.

HEAT RETENTION – Our design provides superior heat retention for cooking. And they conduct heat evenly, so that your meals will turn out perfectly cooked every time. Plus the sturdy handle aids in lifting, and provides a hole for hanging when not in use.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We are so confident in the quality of our product that we offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee! If you are unsatisfied, simply contact us to return the product for a full refund.
